## PrefixedProps type

Constructs a tuple type of `TProps` without specified `TPrefixes` and picked prefixed properties for each prefix specified by the `TPrefixes`<!-- -->. This is a return type of hook [usePrefixedProps()](./use-prefixed-props.useprefixedprops.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PrefixedProps<TProps, TPrefixes extends Prefix[]> = [
    OmitPrefixedArray<TProps, TPrefixes>,
    ...PickPrefixedArray<TProps, TPrefixes>
];
```
**References:** [Prefix](./use-prefixed-props.prefix.md)<!-- -->, [OmitPrefixedArray](./use-prefixed-props.omitprefixedarray.md)<!-- -->, [PickPrefixedArray](./use-prefixed-props.pickprefixedarray.md)

## Example


```ts
 type Props = { foo: unknown, "foo-bar": unknown, "bar-baz": unknown }

 type PropsTuple = PrefixedProps<Props, ["foo", "bar"]>
 // [ { foo: unknown }, { bar: unknown }, { baz: unknown } ]
```
